name: Jammie Kirby
story: Jammie Kirby grew up near Salisbury Plain, where her fascination with military vehicles began at an early age. She enlisted in the British Army as soon as she was of legal age and has been serving as a crewman ever since. Her skill at maneuvering armored vehicles in tight spots has saved her unit on numerous occasions. Her colleagues appreciate her quiet confidence and her practical approach to problem-solving.
